text: "Let's Wait Awhile" is a 1987 pop ballad by singer Janet Jackson. The song reached #2 in the United States and #3 in the United Kingdom. This song is about sexual abstinence. The song received mostly positive reviews from the music critics. It was released in early 1987. It is from 1986 album Control. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Janet Jackson songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs about sexuality
title: Let's Wait Awhile
